content: this is a summary of a legal case that took place in the higher court in ljubljana the text does not provide specific details about the parties involved or the case itself however it explains that the case involves a compensation claim and has reached the court of appeal the judgment of the first instance court determined the value of a joint investment in a residential house and the division of assets between the former spouses the court of appeal dismissed the appeals made by both parties and upheld the judgment of the first instance court the court also ordered one party to pay the costs of the appeal proceedings the text mentions the application of certain laws such as the marriage family relations act and the civil procedure act in making the decision the court considered various factors including investments claims and the value of separate assets in reaching its decision the court of appeal agreed with the defendants argument that the presumption of equal shares in a property should be rebutted based on the specific circumstances of the case the court determined that the defendant should have a 60 share in the coowned property while the plaintiff should have a 40 share the court of appeal reviewed the case and found errors in the judgment but ultimately upheld the decision of the first instance court the costs of the case will be determined based on the outcome and specific circumstances and the unsuccessful appellant is responsible for paying the costs of the appeal proceedings
